content: Graphene oxide (GO) was synthesized accroding to the previous literature method. 0.2 g of Cu­(OAc)2·H2O, 0.3 g of phosphomolybdic acid hydrate, and 0.07 g of l-glutamic acid were added into ultrapurified water (40 mL) to form solution A. The GO solution (7.5 mg, 5 mg mL–1) was dispersed into solution A dropwise under continuous stirring. Subsequently, 0.14 g of 1,3,5-benzenetricarboxylic acid was dissolved in ethanol (40 mL) and then added dropwise into the above solution with intense stirring. After 16 h, the mixture was collected by filtration and washing. Finally, the obtained sample was designed as NENU-5/GO after freeze dyring.
clean_text:
Experimental Section

Synthesis of NENU-5/GO and NENU-5

Graphene oxide (GO) was synthesized accroding to the previous literature method. 0.2 g of Cu(OAc)2⋅H2O, 0.3 g of phosphomolybdic acid hydrate, and 0.07 g of l-glutamic acid were added into ultrapurified water (40 mL) to form solution A. The GO solution (7.5 mg, 5 mg mL-1) was dispersed into solution A dropwise under continuous stirring. Subsequently, 0.14 g of 1,3,5-benzenetricarboxylic acid was dissolved in ethanol (40 mL) and then added dropwise into the above solution with intense stirring. After 16 h, the mixture was collected by filtration and washing. Finally, the obtained sample was designed as NENU-5/GO after freeze dyring.
